categories.description: Company | Get to know the #kindhumans at Vendia with insights into our teams, values, and culture
Podcast | Catch up on Circles of Trust, conversations with real-time data sharing innovation leaders
Announcements | Be first to hear what’s new and next for Vendia and the Vendia Share platform
Tutorials | Get helpful tips, instructions, and code callouts from our Developers and Solutions Architects
Product | Dive deep into the Vendia Share platform with product-centric features, benefits, and updates
Architecture | Explore the principles and practices of data architecture in modern and next-gen IT solutions
Concepts | Unpack and reframe legacy and modern data sharing concepts, challenges, and solutions
Real-time data sharing | Bust up myths and rethink what’s possible for your team with multi-party, real-time data sharing
Blockchain | Explore next-gen, enterprise-level blockchain tech for your multi-party data sharing applications
Data alliance | Discover tools and insights to help you scale, yet control data sharing with partners
Lean apps | Learn how the lean apps movement will decrease toil and increase productivity for teams
Smart APIs | Explore new ways to turn your “ignorant pipes” into data-aware APIs for multi-party data sharing
Guidance | Learn the most effective principles and practices for building on the Vendia Share platform
Features | Deep dive into a specific feature or set of features of the Vendia Share Platform
Case studies | Dig into industry use cases and success stories from teams wielding Vendia Share
